ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hangouts for teens
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahh. Ok. Most of the time when I group with monks, even if there is a warrior they can maintain aggro and I just keep healing. Only works when I have C3
ygData.messageBody:
Ahh. Ok. Most of the time when I group with monks, even if there is a
warrior they can maintain aggro and I just keep healing. Only works when I
have C3 though. Works a little better now that I have my 7th shawl bc the
flowing thought stacks with KEI. :-)
luv,
-Su

I was talking about monks when I said that it isnot the warriors job to keep
aggro off of them. In some of them more complicated encounters, this is the
hardest part, keeping the mob off the first mob in the rotation. I play a
cleric also :)

Awulfie A'Mused
